description: Rarely Available End Unit in Brighton – Silver Valley!  3 bed, 2 bath end-unit backing onto greenspace with SW exposure and a large, private backyard oasis! Open-concept layout with 9-ft ceilings, granite kitchen island, new paint, laminate on main. Bright front deck off living room with park views. Spacious primary with his & hers closets + ensuite. Full driveway, double tandem garage, low strata fees, and visitor parking next door. Minutes to parks, schools & trails.  A true gem in a family-friendly, award-winning community!
